an9.15:1.2: Tassassu gaṇḍassa nava vaṇamukhāni nava abhedanamukhāni.
an9.15:1.4: asuciyeva pagghareyya, duggandhaṁyeva pagghareyya, jegucchiyaṁyeva pagghareyya;
an9.15:1.6: asuciyeva pasaveyya, duggandhaṁyeva pasaveyya, jegucchiyaṁyeva pasaveyya.
an9.15:2.1: Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, imassetaṁ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṁ mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṁsanadhammassa.
an9.15:2.2: Tassassu gaṇḍassa nava vaṇamukhāni nava abhedanamukhāni.
an9.15:2.4: asuciyeva paggharati, duggandhaṁyeva paggharati, jegucchiyaṁyeva paggharati;
an9.15:2.6: asuciyeva pasavati, duggandhaṁyeva pasavati, jegucchiyaṁyeva pasavati.
